00002 #define _LANG_DOUBLELINKEDLIST_H

00005 #include <lang/pp.h>

00010 
00011 class DoubleLinkedListItemBase
00012 {
00013 public:
00017     bool    linked() const      {return 0 != m_next || 0 != m_previous;}
00018 
00019 protected:
00020     DoubleLinkedListItemBase() : m_next(0), m_previous(0) {}
00021     virtual ~DoubleLinkedListItemBase();
00022 
00023     friend class DoubleLinkedListBase;
00024     DoubleLinkedListItemBase* m_next; 
00025     DoubleLinkedListItemBase* m_previous;
00026 
00027 private:
00028     DoubleLinkedListItemBase( const DoubleLinkedListItemBase& );
00029     DoubleLinkedListItemBase& operator=( const DoubleLinkedListItemBase& );
00030 };
00031 
00032 class DoubleLinkedListBase
00033 {
00034 public:
00035     DoubleLinkedListBase();
00036     virtual ~DoubleLinkedListBase();
00037     
00038     void    insert( DoubleLinkedListItemBase* item );
00039     void    insertAfter( DoubleLinkedListItemBase* beforeItem, DoubleLinkedListItemBase* item);
00040     void    remove( DoubleLinkedListItemBase* item );
00041 
00042     DoubleLinkedListItemBase*       last() const;
00043 
00044 protected:
00045     DoubleLinkedListItemBase*       m_first;
00046     DoubleLinkedListItemBase*       m_last;
00047 
00048 private:
00049     DoubleLinkedListBase( const DoubleLinkedListBase& );
00050     DoubleLinkedListBase& operator=( const DoubleLinkedListBase& );
00051 };
00052 
00057 template <class T> class DoubleLinkedListItem :
00058     public DoubleLinkedListItemBase
00059 {
00060 public:
00064     T*      next() const            {return static_cast<T*>( m_next );}
00065 
00069     T*      previous() const        {return static_cast<T*>( m_previous );}
00070 };
00071 
00076 template <class T> class DoubleLinkedList :
00077     public DoubleLinkedListBase
00078 {
00079 public:
00083     void    insert( T* item )       {DoubleLinkedListBase::insert( item );}
00084 
00088     void    remove( T* item )       {DoubleLinkedListBase::remove( item );}
00089 
00093     T*      first() const           {return static_cast<T*>( m_first );}
00094     
00098     T*      last() const            {return static_cast<T*>( DoubleLinkedListBase::last() );}
00099 };
